channel.title: Prayers keep changing to normal after logout
channel.description:
i believe the better prayers are called ancient prayers or something,got turmoil and soulsplit. well every time someone logs out it resets there prayerbook to the normal prayers
what i want it to do is stay on the same prayerbook after logout

item.title: Prayers keep changing to normal after logout
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Probably find where the turmoil code is located and remove the requirement?

Read full topic

item.title: Prayers keep changing to normal after logout
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

Like docent said, you gotta make it save in the player file.

i.e if you’ve found the object that makes it change to the magic interface, you could make a boolean saying
Curses = true;

and then somewhere something like

	[code]else if (Curses == true) 
	{
		ancients = 0; // or whatever is used for the ancients
		setSidebarInterface(6, #####); // w.e is used
		sendMessage("##");
		savemoreinfo(); // whatever is used for the savings
	}
}

[/code]

and then you should find the piece of code where it will write up on your player file

i.e

} else if (token.equals("character-ancients")) { ancients = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and just copy how it is done with something else

etc etc etc

Read full topic
